channel.title: Patches on X0eX Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Patches on X0eX Blog

item.title: India ID Verification Company is running insecure code in Android application
item.description: On Twitter, a security researcher who goes by the name Elliot Anderson revealed that Aadhaar was using insecure code and the company was saving personal user details including pictures in a local database with a hard coded password.

item.title: Qubes OS is offering additional protection for its systems from Meltdown through "fully virtualized" VMs
item.description: The Qubes OS new security pack mentions that “fully virtualized” VMs provide significant security for Meltdown attacks.
